alert.note: Alert for Henry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 11:04AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Benton and Henry Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1104 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Paris, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paris, Paris Landing State Park, Springville, Puryear, Haigler Ridge, Foundry Hill, Old Springville, Buchanan, India, Mill Creek, Osage, Sunnyside, Van Dyke, Whitlock, Porter Court, Conyersville, Pine Hill, Jones Mill and Big Sandy Unit Tennessee National Wildlife Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
